00071 uint8_t  USB_DeviceAddress;
00072 uint8_t  USB_Configuration;
00073 uint32_t USB_EndPointMask;

00075 uint32_t USB_EndPointStall;                         /* EP must stay stalled */

00087 /*
00088  *  Reset USB Core
00089  *    Parameters:      None
00090  *    Return Value:    None
00091  */
00092 
00093 void USB_ResetCore (void) {
00094 
00095   USB_DeviceStatus  = USB_POWER;
00096   USB_DeviceAddress = 0;
00097   USB_Configuration = 0;
00098   USB_EndPointMask  = 0x00010001;
00099   USB_EndPointHalt  = 0x00000000;
00100   USB_EndPointStall = 0x00000000;
00101 }

00104 /*
00105  *  USB Request - Setup Stage
00106  *    Parameters:      None (global SetupPacket)
00107  *    Return Value:    None
00108  */
00109 
00110 void USB_SetupStage (void) {
00111   USB_ReadEP(0x00, (uint8_t *)&SetupPacket);
00112 }
00113 
00114 
00115 /*
00116  *  USB Request - Data In Stage
00117  *    Parameters:      None (global EP0Data)
00118  *    Return Value:    None
00119  */
00120 
00121 void USB_DataInStage (void) {
00122   uint32_t cnt;
00123 
00124   if (EP0Data.Count > USB_MAX_PACKET0) {
00125     cnt = USB_MAX_PACKET0;
00126   } else {
00127     cnt = EP0Data.Count;
00128   }
00129   cnt = USB_WriteEP(0x80, EP0Data.pData, cnt);
00130   EP0Data.pData += cnt;
00131   EP0Data.Count -= cnt;
00132 }
00133 
00134 
00135 /*
00136  *  USB Request - Data Out Stage
00137  *    Parameters:      None (global EP0Data)
00138  *    Return Value:    None
00139  */
00140 
00141 void USB_DataOutStage (void) {
00142   uint32_t cnt;
00143 
00144   cnt = USB_ReadEP(0x00, EP0Data.pData);
00145   EP0Data.pData += cnt;
00146   EP0Data.Count -= cnt;
00147 }

00152  *    Parameters:      None

00154  */
00155 
00156 void USB_StatusInStage (void) {
00157   USB_WriteEP(0x80, NULL, 0);

00166 
00167 void USB_StatusOutStage (void) {

00172 /*
00173  *  Get Status USB Request
00174  *    Parameters:      None (global SetupPacket)
00175  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00176  */
00177 
00178 #if defined (  __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__  )
00179 inline uint32_t USB_ReqGetStatus (void) {
00180 #else  
00181 __inline uint32_t USB_ReqGetStatus (void) {
00182 #endif
00183   uint32_t n, m;
00184 
00185   switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00186     case REQUEST_TO_DEVICE:
00187       EP0Data.pData = (uint8_t *)&USB_DeviceStatus;
00188       break;
00189     case REQUEST_TO_INTERFACE:
00190       if ((USB_Configuration != 0) && (SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L < USB_NumInterfaces)) {
00191         *((__packed uint16_t *)EP0Buf) = 0;
00192           *((uint16_t *)EP0Buf) = 0;
00193         EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;
00194       } else {
00195         return (FALSE);
00196       }
00197       break;
00198     case REQUEST_TO_ENDPOINT:
00199       n = SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L & 0x8F;
00200       m = (n & 0x80) ? ((1 << 16) << (n & 0x0F)) : (1 << n);
00201       if (((USB_Configuration != 0) || ((n & 0x0F) == 0)) && (USB_EndPointMask & m)) {
00202         *((__packed uint16_t *)EP0Buf) = (USB_EndPointHalt & m) ? 1 : 0;
00203           *((uint16_t *)EP0Buf) = (USB_EndPointHalt & m) ? 1 : 0;
00204         EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;
00205       } else {
00206         return (FALSE);
00207       }
00208       break;
00209     default:
00210       return (FALSE);
00211   }
00212   return (TRUE);
00213 }
00214 
00215 
00216 /*
00217  *  Set/Clear Feature USB Request
00218  *    Parameters:      sc:    0 - Clear, 1 - Set
00219  *                            (global SetupPacket)
00220  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00221  */
00222 
00223 #if defined (  __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__  )
00224 inline uint32_t USB_ReqSetClrFeature (uint32_t sc) {
00225 #else
00226 __inline uint32_t USB_ReqSetClrFeature (uint32_t sc) {
00227 #endif
00228   uint32_t n, m;
00229 
00230   switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00231     case REQUEST_TO_DEVICE:
00232       if (SetupPacket.wValue.W == USB_FEATURE_REMOTE_WAKEUP) {
00233         if (sc) {
00234           USB_WakeUpCfg(TRUE);
00235           USB_DeviceStatus |=  USB_GETSTATUS_REMOTE_WAKEUP;
00236         } else {
00237           USB_WakeUpCfg(FALSE);
00238           USB_DeviceStatus &= ~USB_GETSTATUS_REMOTE_WAKEUP;
00239         }
00240       } else {
00241         return (FALSE);
00242       }
00243       break;
00244     case REQUEST_TO_INTERFACE:
00245       return (FALSE);
00246     case REQUEST_TO_ENDPOINT:
00247       n = SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L & 0x8F;
00248       m = (n & 0x80) ? ((1 << 16) << (n & 0x0F)) : (1 << n);
00249       if ((USB_Configuration != 0) && ((n & 0x0F) != 0) && (USB_EndPointMask & m)) {
00250         if (SetupPacket.wValue.W == USB_FEATURE_ENDPOINT_STALL) {
00251           if (sc) {
00252             USB_SetStallEP(n);
00253             USB_EndPointHalt |=  m;
00254           } else {
00255             if ((USB_EndPointStall & m) != 0) {
00256               return (TRUE);
00257             }
00258             USB_ClrStallEP(n);
00259 #if (USB_MSC)
00260             if ((n == MSC_EP_IN) && ((USB_EndPointHalt & m) != 0)) {
00261               /* Compliance Test: rewrite CSW after unstall */
00262               if (CSW.dSignature == MSC_CSW_Signature) {
00263                 USB_WriteEP(MSC_EP_IN, (uint8_t *)&CSW, sizeof(CSW));
00264               }
00265             }
00266 #endif
00267             USB_EndPointHalt &= ~m;
00268           }
00269         } else {
00270           return (FALSE);
00271         }
00272       } else {
00273         return (FALSE);
00274       }
00275       break;
00276     default:
00277       return (FALSE);
00278   }
00279   return (TRUE);
00280 }

00283 /*
00284  *  Set Address USB Request
00285  *    Parameters:      None (global SetupPacket)
00286  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00287  */
00288 
00289 #if defined (  __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__  )
00290 inline uint32_t USB_ReqSetAddress (void) {
00291 #else
00292 __inline uint32_t USB_ReqSetAddress (void) {
00293 #endif
00294   switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00295     case REQUEST_TO_DEVICE:
00296       USB_DeviceAddress = 0x80 | SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L;
00297       break;
00298     default:
00299       return (FALSE);
00300   }
00301   return (TRUE);
00302 }

00304 
00305 /*
00306  *  Get Descriptor USB Request
00307  *    Parameters:      None (global SetupPacket)
00308  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00309  */
00310 
00311 #if defined (  __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__  )
00312 inline uint32_t USB_ReqGetDescriptor (void) {
00313 #else
00314 __inline uint32_t USB_ReqGetDescriptor (void) {
00315 #endif
00316   uint8_t  *pD;
00317   uint32_t len, n;
00318 
00319   switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00320     case REQUEST_TO_DEVICE:
00321       switch (SetupPacket.wValue.WB.H) {
00322         case USB_DEVICE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00323           EP0Data.pData = (uint8_t *)USB_DeviceDescriptor;
00324           len = USB_DEVICE_DESC_SIZE;
00325           break;
00326         case USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00327           pD = (uint8_t *)USB_ConfigDescriptor;
00328           for (n = 0; n != SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L; n++) {
00329             if (((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bLength != 0) {
00330               pD += ((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->wTotalLength;
00331             }
00332           }
00333           if (((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bLength == 0) {
00334             return (FALSE);
00335           }
00336           EP0Data.pData = pD;
00337           len = ((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->wTotalLength;
00338           break;
00339         case USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00340           pD = (uint8_t *)USB_StringDescriptor;
00341           for (n = 0; n != SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L; n++) {
00342             if (((USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bLength != 0) {
00343               pD += ((USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bLength;
00344             }
00345           }
00346           if (((USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bLength == 0) {
00347             return (FALSE);
00348           }
00349           EP0Data.pData = pD;
00350           len = ((USB_STRING_DESCRIPTOR *)EP0Data.pData)->bLength;
00351           break;
00352         default:
00353           return (FALSE);
00354       }
00355       break;
00356     case REQUEST_TO_INTERFACE:
00357       switch (SetupPacket.wValue.WB.H) {
00358 #if USB_HID
00359         case HID_HID_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00360           if (SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L != USB_HID_IF_NUM) {
00361             return (FALSE);    /* Only Single HID Interface is supported */
00362           }
00363           EP0Data.pData = (uint8_t *)USB_ConfigDescriptor + HID_DESC_OFFSET;
00364           len = HID_DESC_SIZE;
00365           break;
00366         case HID_REPORT_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00367           if (SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L != USB_HID_IF_NUM) {
00368             return (FALSE);    /* Only Single HID Interface is supported */
00369           }
00370           EP0Data.pData = (uint8_t *)HID_ReportDescriptor;
00371           len = HID_ReportDescSize;
00372           break;
00373         case HID_PHYSICAL_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00374           return (FALSE);      /* HID Physical Descriptor is not supported */
00375 #endif
00376         default:
00377           return (FALSE);
00378       }
00379 //      break;
00380     default:
00381       return (FALSE);
00382   }
00383 
00384   if (EP0Data.Count > len) {
00385     EP0Data.Count = len;
00386   }
00387 
00388   return (TRUE);
00389 }
00390

00393  *  Get Configuration USB Request

00395  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00396  */
00397 
00398 #if defined (  __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__  )
00399 inline uint32_t USB_ReqGetConfiguration (void) {
00400 #else
00401 __inline uint32_t USB_ReqGetConfiguration (void) {
00402 #endif
00403   switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00404     case REQUEST_TO_DEVICE:
00405       EP0Data.pData = &USB_Configuration;
00406       break;
00407     default:
00408       return (FALSE);
00409   }
00410   return (TRUE);
00411 }

00413 
00414 /*
00415  *  Set Configuration USB Request
00416  *    Parameters:      None (global SetupPacket)
00417  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00418  */
00419 
00420 #if defined (  __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__  )
00421 inline uint32_t USB_ReqSetConfiguration (void) {
00422 #else
00423 __inline uint32_t USB_ReqSetConfiguration (void) {
00424 #endif
00425   USB_COMMON_DESCRIPTOR *pD;
00426   uint32_t alt = 0;
00427   uint32_t n, m;
00428   uint32_t tmp;
00429 
00430   switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00431     case REQUEST_TO_DEVICE:
00432 
00433       if (SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L) {
00434         pD = (USB_COMMON_DESCRIPTOR *)USB_ConfigDescriptor;
00435         while (pD->bLength) {
00436           switch (pD->bDescriptorType) {
00437             case USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00438               if (((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bConfigurationValue == SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L) {
00439                 USB_Configuration = SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L;
00440                 USB_NumInterfaces = ((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bNumInterfaces;
00441                 for (n = 0; n < USB_IF_NUM; n++) {
00442                   USB_AltSetting[n] = 0;
00443                 }
00444                 for (n = 1; n < 16; n++) {
00445                   if (USB_EndPointMask & (1 << n)) {
00446                     USB_DisableEP(n);
00447                   }
00448                   if (USB_EndPointMask & ((1 << 16) << n)) {
00449                     USB_DisableEP(n | 0x80);
00450                   }
00451                 }
00452                 USB_EndPointMask = 0x00010001;
00453                 USB_EndPointHalt = 0x00000000;
00454                 USB_EndPointStall= 0x00000000;
00455                 USB_Configure(TRUE);
00456                 if (((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bmAttributes & USB_CONFIG_POWERED_MASK) {
00457                   USB_DeviceStatus |=  USB_GETSTATUS_SELF_POWERED;
00458                 } else {
00459                   USB_DeviceStatus &= ~USB_GETSTATUS_SELF_POWERED;
00460                 }
00461               } else {
00462 //                (uint8_t *)pD += ((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->wTotalLength;
00463                   tmp = (uint32_t)pD;
00464                   tmp += ((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->wTotalLength;
00465                   pD = (USB_COMMON_DESCRIPTOR *)tmp;
00466                   continue;
00467               }
00468               break;
00469             case USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00470               alt = ((USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bAlternateSetting;
00471               break;
00472             case USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00473               if (alt == 0) {
00474                 n = ((USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bEndpointAddress & 0x8F;
00475                 m = (n & 0x80) ? ((1 << 16) << (n & 0x0F)) : (1 << n);
00476                 USB_EndPointMask |= m;
00477                 USB_ConfigEP((USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR *)pD);
00478                 USB_EnableEP(n);
00479                 USB_ResetEP(n);
00480               }
00481               break;
00482           }
00483 //          (uint8_t *)pD += pD->bLength;
00484                         tmp = (uint32_t)pD;
00485                         tmp += pD->bLength;
00486                         pD = (USB_COMMON_DESCRIPTOR *)tmp;
00487         }
00488       }
00489       else {
00490         USB_Configuration = 0;
00491         for (n = 1; n < 16; n++) {
00492           if (USB_EndPointMask & (1 << n)) {
00493             USB_DisableEP(n);
00494           }
00495           if (USB_EndPointMask & ((1 << 16) << n)) {
00496             USB_DisableEP(n | 0x80);
00497           }
00498         }
00499         USB_EndPointMask  = 0x00010001;
00500         USB_EndPointHalt  = 0x00000000;
00501         USB_EndPointStall = 0x00000000;
00502         USB_Configure(FALSE);
00503       }
00504 
00505       if (USB_Configuration != SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L) {
00506         return (FALSE);
00507       }
00508       break;
00509     default:
00510       return (FALSE);
00511   }
00512   return (TRUE);
00513 }
00514 
00515 
00516 /*
00517  *  Get Interface USB Request
00518  *    Parameters:      None (global SetupPacket)
00519  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00520  */
00521 
00522 #if defined (  __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__  )
00523 inline uint32_t USB_ReqGetInterface (void) {
00524 #else
00525 __inline uint32_t USB_ReqGetInterface (void) {
00526 #endif
00527   switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00528     case REQUEST_TO_INTERFACE:
00529       if ((USB_Configuration != 0) && (SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L < USB_NumInterfaces)) {
00530         EP0Data.pData = USB_AltSetting + SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L;
00531       } else {
00532         return (FALSE);
00533       }
00534       break;
00535     default:
00536       return (FALSE);
00537   }
00538   return (TRUE);
00539 }
00540 
00541 
00542 /*
00543  *  Set Interface USB Request
00544  *    Parameters:      None (global SetupPacket)
00545  *    Return Value:    TRUE - Success, FALSE - Error
00546  */
00547 #if defined (  __IAR_SYSTEMS_ICC__  )
00548 inline uint32_t USB_ReqSetInterface (void) {
00549 #else
00550 __inline uint32_t USB_ReqSetInterface (void) {
00551 #endif
00552   USB_COMMON_DESCRIPTOR *pD;
00553   uint32_t ifn = 0, alt = 0, old = 0, msk = 0;
00554   uint32_t n, m;
00555   uint32_t set;
00556   uint32_t tmp;
00557 
00558   switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00559     case REQUEST_TO_INTERFACE:
00560       if (USB_Configuration == 0) return (FALSE);
00561       set = FALSE;
00562       pD  = (USB_COMMON_DESCRIPTOR *)USB_ConfigDescriptor;
00563       while (pD->bLength) {
00564         switch (pD->bDescriptorType) {
00565           case USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00566             if (((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bConfigurationValue != USB_Configuration) {
00567 //              (uint8_t *)pD += ((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->wTotalLength;
00568                 tmp = (uint32_t)pD;
00569                 tmp += ((USB_CONFIGURATION_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->wTotalLength;
00570                 pD = (USB_COMMON_DESCRIPTOR *)tmp;
00571 
00572               continue;
00573             }
00574             break;
00575           case USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00576             ifn = ((USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bInterfaceNumber;
00577             alt = ((USB_INTERFACE_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bAlternateSetting;
00578             msk = 0;
00579             if ((ifn == SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L) && (alt == SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L)) {
00580               set = TRUE;
00581               old = USB_AltSetting[ifn];
00582               USB_AltSetting[ifn] = (uint8_t)alt;
00583             }
00584             break;
00585           case USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR_TYPE:
00586             if (ifn == SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L) {
00587               n = ((USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR *)pD)->bEndpointAddress & 0x8F;
00588               m = (n & 0x80) ? ((1 << 16) << (n & 0x0F)) : (1 << n);
00589               if (alt == SetupPacket.wValue.WB.L) {
00590                 USB_EndPointMask |=  m;
00591                 USB_EndPointHalt &= ~m;
00592                 USB_ConfigEP((USB_ENDPOINT_DESCRIPTOR *)pD);
00593                 USB_EnableEP(n);
00594                 USB_ResetEP(n);
00595                 msk |= m;
00596               }
00597               else if ((alt == old) && ((msk & m) == 0)) {
00598                 USB_EndPointMask &= ~m;
00599                 USB_EndPointHalt &= ~m;
00600                 USB_DisableEP(n);
00601               }
00602             }
00603            break;
00604         }
00605 //        (uint8_t *)pD += pD->bLength;
00606                         tmp = (uint32_t)pD;
00607                         tmp += pD->bLength;
00608                         pD = (USB_COMMON_DESCRIPTOR *)tmp;
00609       }
00610       break;
00611     default:
00612       return (FALSE);
00613   }
00614 
00615   return (set);
00616 }
00617 
00618 
00619 /*
00620  *  USB Endpoint 0 Event Callback
00621  *    Parameters:      event
00622  *    Return Value:    none
00623  */
00624 
00625 void USB_EndPoint0 (uint32_t event) {
00626 
00627   switch (event) {
00628     case USB_EVT_SETUP:
00629       USB_SetupStage();
00630       USB_DirCtrlEP(SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Dir);
00631       EP0Data.Count = SetupPacket.wLength;     /* Number of bytes to transfer */
00632       switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Type) {
00633 
00634         case REQUEST_STANDARD:
00635           switch (SetupPacket.bRequest) {
00636             case USB_REQUEST_GET_STATUS:
00637               if (!USB_ReqGetStatus()) {
00638                 goto stall_i;
00639               }
00640               USB_DataInStage();
00641               break;
00642 
00643             case USB_REQUEST_CLEAR_FEATURE:
00644               if (!USB_ReqSetClrFeature(0)) {
00645                 goto stall_i;
00646               }
00647               USB_StatusInStage();
00648 #if USB_FEATURE_EVENT
00649               USB_Feature_Event();
00650 #endif
00651               break;
00652 
00653             case USB_REQUEST_SET_FEATURE:
00654               if (!USB_ReqSetClrFeature(1)) {
00655                 goto stall_i;
00656               }
00657               USB_StatusInStage();
00658 #if USB_FEATURE_EVENT
00659               USB_Feature_Event();
00660 #endif
00661               break;
00662 
00663             case USB_REQUEST_SET_ADDRESS:
00664               if (!USB_ReqSetAddress()) {
00665                 goto stall_i;
00666               }
00667               USB_StatusInStage();
00668               break;
00669 
00670             case USB_REQUEST_GET_DESCRIPTOR:
00671               if (!USB_ReqGetDescriptor()) {
00672                 goto stall_i;
00673               }
00674               USB_DataInStage();
00675               break;
00676 
00677             case USB_REQUEST_SET_DESCRIPTOR:
00678 /*stall_o:*/  USB_SetStallEP(0x00);            /* not supported */
00679               EP0Data.Count = 0;
00680               break;
00681 
00682             case USB_REQUEST_GET_CONFIGURATION:
00683               if (!USB_ReqGetConfiguration()) {
00684                 goto stall_i;
00685               }
00686               USB_DataInStage();
00687               break;
00688 
00689             case USB_REQUEST_SET_CONFIGURATION:
00690               if (!USB_ReqSetConfiguration()) {
00691                 goto stall_i;
00692               }
00693               USB_StatusInStage();
00694 #if USB_CONFIGURE_EVENT
00695               USB_Configure_Event();
00696 #endif
00697               break;
00698 
00699             case USB_REQUEST_GET_INTERFACE:
00700               if (!USB_ReqGetInterface()) {
00701                 goto stall_i;
00702               }
00703               USB_DataInStage();
00704               break;
00705 
00706             case USB_REQUEST_SET_INTERFACE:
00707               if (!USB_ReqSetInterface()) {
00708                 goto stall_i;
00709               }
00710               USB_StatusInStage();
00711 #if USB_INTERFACE_EVENT
00712               USB_Interface_Event();
00713 #endif
00714               break;
00715 
00716             default:
00717               goto stall_i;
00718           }
00719           break;  /* end case REQUEST_STANDARD */
00720 
00721 #if USB_CLASS
00722         case REQUEST_CLASS:
00723           switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00724 
00725             case REQUEST_TO_DEVICE:
00726               goto stall_i;                                              /* not supported */
00727 
00728             case REQUEST_TO_INTERFACE:
00729 #if USB_HID
00730               if (SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L == USB_HID_IF_NUM) {           /* IF number correct? */
00731                 switch (SetupPacket.bRequest) {
00732                   case HID_REQUEST_GET_REPORT:
00733                     if (HID_GetReport()) {
00734                       EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;                            /* point to data to be sent */
00735                       USB_DataInStage();                                 /* send requested data */
00736                       goto setup_class_ok;
00737                     }
00738                     break;
00739                   case HID_REQUEST_SET_REPORT:
00740                     EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;                              /* data to be received */
00741                     goto setup_class_ok;
00742                   case HID_REQUEST_GET_IDLE:
00743                     if (HID_GetIdle()) {
00744                       EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;                            /* point to data to be sent */
00745                       USB_DataInStage();                                 /* send requested data */
00746                       goto setup_class_ok;
00747                     }
00748                     break;
00749                   case HID_REQUEST_SET_IDLE:
00750                     if (HID_SetIdle()) {
00751                       USB_StatusInStage();                               /* send Acknowledge */
00752                       goto setup_class_ok;
00753                     }
00754                     break;
00755                   case HID_REQUEST_GET_PROTOCOL:
00756                     if (HID_GetProtocol()) {
00757                       EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;                            /* point to data to be sent */
00758                       USB_DataInStage();                                 /* send requested data */
00759                       goto setup_class_ok;
00760                     }
00761                     break;
00762                   case HID_REQUEST_SET_PROTOCOL:
00763                     if (HID_SetProtocol()) {
00764                       USB_StatusInStage();                               /* send Acknowledge */
00765                       goto setup_class_ok;
00766                     }
00767                     break;
00768                 }
00769               }
00770 #endif  /* USB_HID */
00771 #if USB_MSC
00772               if (SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L == USB_MSC_IF_NUM) {           /* IF number correct? */
00773                 switch (SetupPacket.bRequest) {
00774                   case MSC_REQUEST_RESET:
00775                     if ((SetupPacket.wValue.W == 0) &&                   /* RESET with invalid parameters -> STALL */
00776                         (SetupPacket.wLength  == 0)) {
00777                       if (MSC_Reset()) {
00778                         USB_StatusInStage();
00779                         goto setup_class_ok;
00780                       }
00781                     }
00782                     break;
00783                   case MSC_REQUEST_GET_MAX_LUN:
00784                     if ((SetupPacket.wValue.W == 0) &&                   /* GET_MAX_LUN with invalid parameters -> STALL */
00785                         (SetupPacket.wLength  == 1)) {
00786                       if (MSC_GetMaxLUN()) {
00787                         EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;
00788                         USB_DataInStage();
00789                         goto setup_class_ok;
00790                       }
00791                     }
00792                     break;
00793                 }
00794               }
00795 #endif  /* USB_MSC */
00796 #if USB_AUDIO
00797               if ((SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L == USB_ADC_CIF_NUM)  ||       /* IF number correct? */
00798                   (SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L == USB_ADC_SIF1_NUM) ||
00799                   (SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L == USB_ADC_SIF2_NUM)) {
00800                 switch (SetupPacket.bRequest) {
00801                   case AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_CUR:
00802                   case AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_MIN:
00803                   case AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_MAX:
00804                   case AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_RES:
00805                     if (ADC_IF_GetRequest()) {
00806                       EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;                            /* point to data to be sent */
00807                       USB_DataInStage();                                 /* send requested data */
00808                       goto setup_class_ok;
00809                     }
00810                     break;
00811                   case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_CUR:
00812 //                case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_MIN:
00813 //                case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_MAX:
00814 //                case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_RES:
00815                     EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;                              /* data to be received */
00816                     goto setup_class_ok;
00817                 }
00818               }
00819 #endif  /* USB_AUDIO */
00820 #if USB_CDC
00821               if ((SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L == USB_CDC_CIF_NUM)  ||       /* IF number correct? */
00822                   (SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L == USB_CDC_DIF_NUM)) {
00823                 switch (SetupPacket.bRequest) {
00824                   case CDC_SEND_ENCAPSULATED_COMMAND:
00825                     EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;                              /* data to be received, see USB_EVT_OUT */
00826                     goto setup_class_ok;
00827                   case CDC_GET_ENCAPSULATED_RESPONSE:
00828                     if (CDC_GetEncapsulatedResponse()) {
00829                       EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;                            /* point to data to be sent */
00830                       USB_DataInStage();                                 /* send requested data */
00831                       goto setup_class_ok;
00832                     }
00833                     break;
00834                   case CDC_SET_COMM_FEATURE:
00835                     EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;                              /* data to be received, see USB_EVT_OUT */
00836                     goto setup_class_ok;
00837                   case CDC_GET_COMM_FEATURE:
00838                     if (CDC_GetCommFeature(SetupPacket.wValue.W)) {
00839                       EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;                            /* point to data to be sent */
00840                       USB_DataInStage();                                 /* send requested data */
00841                       goto setup_class_ok;
00842                     }
00843                     break;
00844                   case CDC_CLEAR_COMM_FEATURE:
00845                     if (CDC_ClearCommFeature(SetupPacket.wValue.W)) {
00846                       USB_StatusInStage();                               /* send Acknowledge */
00847                       goto setup_class_ok;
00848                     }
00849                     break;
00850                   case CDC_SET_LINE_CODING:
00851                     EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;                              /* data to be received, see USB_EVT_OUT */
00852                     goto setup_class_ok;
00853                   case CDC_GET_LINE_CODING:
00854                     if (CDC_GetLineCoding()) {
00855                       EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;                            /* point to data to be sent */
00856                       USB_DataInStage();                                 /* send requested data */
00857                       goto setup_class_ok;
00858                     }
00859                     break;
00860                   case CDC_SET_CONTROL_LINE_STATE:
00861                     if (CDC_SetControlLineState(SetupPacket.wValue.W)) {
00862                       USB_StatusInStage();                               /* send Acknowledge */
00863                       goto setup_class_ok;
00864                     }
00865                     break;
00866                   case CDC_SEND_BREAK:
00867                     if (CDC_SendBreak(SetupPacket.wValue.W)) {
00868                       USB_StatusInStage();                               /* send Acknowledge */
00869                       goto setup_class_ok;
00870                     }
00871                     break;
00872                 }
00873               }
00874 #endif  /* USB_CDC */
00875               goto stall_i;                                              /* not supported */
00876               /* end case REQUEST_TO_INTERFACE */
00877 
00878             case REQUEST_TO_ENDPOINT:
00879 #if USB_AUDIO
00880               switch (SetupPacket.bRequest) {
00881                 case AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_CUR:
00882                 case AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_MIN:
00883                 case AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_MAX:
00884                 case AUDIO_REQUEST_GET_RES:
00885                   if (ADC_EP_GetRequest()) {
00886                     EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;                              /* point to data to be sent */
00887                     USB_DataInStage();                                   /* send requested data */
00888                     goto setup_class_ok;
00889                   }
00890                   break;
00891                 case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_CUR:
00892 //              case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_MIN:
00893 //              case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_MAX:
00894 //              case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_RES:
00895                   EP0Data.pData = EP0Buf;                                /* data to be received */
00896                   goto setup_class_ok;
00897               }
00898 #endif  /* USB_AUDIO */
00899               goto stall_i;
00900               /* end case REQUEST_TO_ENDPOINT */
00901 
00902             default:
00903               goto stall_i;
00904           }
00905 setup_class_ok:                                                          /* request finished successfully */
00906           break;  /* end case REQUEST_CLASS */
00907 #endif  /* USB_CLASS */
00908 
00909 #if USB_VENDOR
00910         case REQUEST_VENDOR:
00911           switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00912 
00913             case REQUEST_TO_DEVICE:
00914               if (!USB_ReqVendorDev(TRUE)) {
00915                 goto stall_i;                                            /* not supported */
00916               }
00917               break;
00918 
00919             case REQUEST_TO_INTERFACE:
00920               if (!USB_ReqVendorIF(TRUE)) {
00921                 goto stall_i;                                            /* not supported */
00922               }
00923               break;
00924 
00925             case REQUEST_TO_ENDPOINT:
00926               if (!USB_ReqVendorEP(TRUE)) {
00927                 goto stall_i;                                            /* not supported */
00928               }
00929               break;
00930 
00931             default:
00932               goto stall_i;
00933           }
00934 
00935           if (SetupPacket.wLength) {
00936             if (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Dir == REQUEST_DEVICE_TO_HOST) {
00937               USB_DataInStage();
00938             }
00939           } else {
00940             USB_StatusInStage();
00941           }
00942 
00943           break;  /* end case REQUEST_VENDOR */
00944 #endif  /* USB_VENDOR */
00945 
00946         default:
00947 stall_i:  USB_SetStallEP(0x80);
00948           EP0Data.Count = 0;
00949           break;
00950       }
00951       break;  /* end case USB_EVT_SETUP */
00952 
00953     case USB_EVT_OUT:
00954       if (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Dir == REQUEST_HOST_TO_DEVICE) {
00955         if (EP0Data.Count) {                                             /* still data to receive ? */
00956           USB_DataOutStage();                                            /* receive data */
00957           if (EP0Data.Count == 0) {                                      /* data complete ? */
00958             switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Type) {
00959 
00960               case REQUEST_STANDARD:
00961                 goto stall_i;                                            /* not supported */
00962 
00963 #if (USB_CLASS)
00964               case REQUEST_CLASS:
00965                 switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
00966                   case REQUEST_TO_DEVICE:
00967                     goto stall_i;                                        /* not supported */
00968 
00969                   case REQUEST_TO_INTERFACE:
00970 #if USB_HID
00971                     if (SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L == USB_HID_IF_NUM) {     /* IF number correct? */
00972                       switch (SetupPacket.bRequest) {
00973                         case HID_REQUEST_SET_REPORT:
00974                           if (HID_SetReport()) {
00975                             USB_StatusInStage();                         /* send Acknowledge */
00976                             goto out_class_ok;
00977                           }
00978                           break;
00979                       }
00980                     }
00981 #endif  /* USB_HID */
00982 #if USB_AUDIO
00983                     if ((SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L == USB_ADC_CIF_NUM)  || /* IF number correct? */
00984                         (SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L == USB_ADC_SIF1_NUM) ||
00985                         (SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L == USB_ADC_SIF2_NUM)) {
00986                       switch (SetupPacket.bRequest) {
00987                         case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_CUR:
00988 //                      case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_MIN:
00989 //                      case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_MAX:
00990 //                      case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_RES:
00991                           if (ADC_IF_SetRequest()) {
00992                             USB_StatusInStage();                         /* send Acknowledge */
00993                             goto out_class_ok;
00994                           }
00995                           break;
00996                       }
00997                     }
00998 #endif  /* USB_AUDIO */
00999 #if USB_CDC
01000                     if ((SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L == USB_CDC_CIF_NUM)  || /* IF number correct? */
01001                         (SetupPacket.wIndex.WB.L == USB_CDC_DIF_NUM)) {
01002                       switch (SetupPacket.bRequest) {
01003                         case CDC_SEND_ENCAPSULATED_COMMAND:
01004                           if (CDC_SendEncapsulatedCommand()) {
01005                             USB_StatusInStage();                         /* send Acknowledge */
01006                             goto out_class_ok;
01007                           }
01008                           break;
01009                         case CDC_SET_COMM_FEATURE:
01010                           if (CDC_SetCommFeature(SetupPacket.wValue.W)) {
01011                             USB_StatusInStage();                         /* send Acknowledge */
01012                             goto out_class_ok;
01013                           }
01014                           break;
01015                         case CDC_SET_LINE_CODING:
01016                           if (CDC_SetLineCoding()) {
01017                             USB_StatusInStage();                         /* send Acknowledge */
01018                             goto out_class_ok;
01019                           }
01020                           break;
01021                       }
01022                     }
01023 #endif  /* USB_CDC */
01024                     goto stall_i;
01025                     /* end case REQUEST_TO_INTERFACE */
01026 
01027                   case REQUEST_TO_ENDPOINT:
01028 #if USB_AUDIO
01029                     switch (SetupPacket.bRequest) {
01030                       case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_CUR:
01031 //                    case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_MIN:
01032 //                    case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_MAX:
01033 //                    case AUDIO_REQUEST_SET_RES:
01034                         if (ADC_EP_SetRequest()) {
01035                           USB_StatusInStage();                           /* send Acknowledge */
01036                           goto out_class_ok;
01037                         }
01038                         break;
01039                     }
01040 #endif  /* USB_AUDIO */
01041                     goto stall_i;
01042                     /* end case REQUEST_TO_ENDPOINT */
01043 
01044                   default:
01045                     goto stall_i;
01046                 }
01047 out_class_ok:                                                            /* request finished successfully */
01048                 break; /* end case REQUEST_CLASS */
01049 #endif  /* USB_CLASS */
01050 
01051 #if USB_VENDOR
01052               case REQUEST_VENDOR:
01053                 switch (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Recipient) {
01054 
01055                   case REQUEST_TO_DEVICE:
01056                     if (!USB_ReqVendorDev(FALSE)) {
01057                       goto stall_i;                                      /* not supported */
01058                     }
01059                     break;
01060 
01061                   case REQUEST_TO_INTERFACE:
01062                     if (!USB_ReqVendorIF(FALSE)) {
01063                       goto stall_i;                                      /* not supported */
01064                     }
01065                     break;
01066 
01067                   case REQUEST_TO_ENDPOINT:
01068                     if (!USB_ReqVendorEP(FALSE)) {
01069                       goto stall_i;                                      /* not supported */
01070                     }
01071                     break;
01072 
01073                   default:
01074                     goto stall_i;
01075                 }
01076 
01077                 USB_StatusInStage();
01078 
01079                 break;  /* end case REQUEST_VENDOR */
01080 #endif  /* USB_VENDOR */
01081 
01082               default:
01083                 goto stall_i;
01084             }
01085           }
01086         }
01087       } else {
01088         USB_StatusOutStage();                                            /* receive Acknowledge */
01089       }
01090       break;  /* end case USB_EVT_OUT */
01091 
01092     case USB_EVT_IN :
01093       if (SetupPacket.bmRequestType.BM.Dir == REQUEST_DEVICE_TO_HOST) {
01094         USB_DataInStage();                                               /* send data */
01095       } else {
01096         if (USB_DeviceAddress & 0x80) {
01097           USB_DeviceAddress &= 0x7F;
01098           USB_SetAddress(USB_DeviceAddress);
01099         }
01100       }
01101       break;  /* end case USB_EVT_IN */
01102 
01103     case USB_EVT_OUT_STALL:
01104       USB_ClrStallEP(0x00);
01105       break;
01106 
01107     case USB_EVT_IN_STALL:
01108       USB_ClrStallEP(0x80);
01109       break;
01110 
01111   }
01112 }
